blocked_reasons.description: Installer-owned binding evidence file is missing.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Restore governance.paths.json at canonical commands root and rerun.

blocked_reasons.description: Required canonical variables could not be resolved deterministically.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Fix binding paths and rerun bootstrap evidence collection.

blocked_reasons.description: Workspace persistence contract failed for required artifacts.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Resolve lock/path issues and rerun persistence helper.

blocked_reasons.description: Engine selfcheck failed and runtime activation is blocked.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Repair deterministic contracts and rerun selfcheck diagnostics.

blocked_reasons.description: Repository identity could not be resolved under active policy.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Provide git identity evidence or run from a valid repository root.

blocked_reasons.description: Requested surface requires stricter system mode.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Switch to system mode or narrow requested operation scope.

blocked_reasons.description: Requested operation violates operating-mode minimum requirements.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Use required mode or reduce operation scope.

blocked_reasons.description: Persisted session state is stale for current deterministic contract.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Rehydrate session state from canonical evidence and rerun.

blocked_reasons.description: Pack lock is required but missing.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Generate deterministic pack lock and retry.

blocked_reasons.description: Observed pack lock is invalid.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Regenerate pack lock from canonical manifest set.

blocked_reasons.description: Observed pack lock hash differs from expected hash.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Sync lockfile with selected packs and engine version.

blocked_reasons.description: Selected packs define conflicting surface ownership.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Resolve pack conflicts before activation.

blocked_reasons.description: Observed ruleset hash does not match expected deterministic hash.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Recompute ruleset hash and refresh persisted state.

blocked_reasons.description: Observed activation hash does not match expected deterministic hash.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Regenerate activation metadata from current canonical inputs.

blocked_reasons.description: Release hygiene checks failed under strict mode.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Fix release metadata and rerun hygiene selfcheck.

blocked_reasons.description: Legacy session-state format is unsupported in active rollout phase.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Migrate session state to current schema version.

blocked_reasons.description: Blocked decision without a more specific canonical reason code.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Inspect deterministic gate evidence and map to specific reason code.

blocked_reasons.description: Persistence target resolved to forbidden or degenerate location.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Repair persistence path inputs and retry atomic write.

blocked_reasons.description: Persistence path violates allowed contract boundaries.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Use canonical workspace/config-root scoped persistence paths.

blocked_reasons.description: Installer precheck failed because required source artifacts are missing.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Restore installer source files or extract a valid release bundle.

blocked_reasons.description: Installer could not find governance version metadata.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Ensure master.md contains a valid Governance-Version header.

blocked_reasons.description: Installer config root is invalid or unusable.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Provide a writable canonical config root and rerun installer.

blocked_reasons.description: Host capabilities do not satisfy required permission policy.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Run with required host permissions or narrow target surface.

blocked_reasons.description: Command execution capability is disallowed for this run.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Enable required execution capability in host policy.

blocked_reasons.description: Repo document contains a directive classified as unsafe.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Remove or neutralize unsafe repo-doc directive and rerun.

blocked_reasons.description: Repo constraint requests widening of write/command scope beyond policy envelope.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Require explicit widening approval or keep within policy constraints.

blocked_reasons.description: Pipeline mode cannot satisfy interactive approval requirements.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Remove interactive requirement or rerun in user/agents_strict mode.

blocked_reasons.description: Prompt budget exceeded for the active mode.
blocked_reasons.remediation_hint: Reduce prompts or increase budget through explicit policy change.

audit_events.description: Repo document contains unsupported constraint domains.
audit_events.remediation_hint: Convert unsupported constraint into approved policy domain or ignore as non-authoritative.

audit_events.description: Policy precedence resolution has been applied and logged.
audit_events.remediation_hint: Inspect precedence event payload and involved hash refs.
